translation.en: It's beautiful here.
translation.zh: 这里真美

translation.en: Okay, everything is ready.
translation.zh: 好了 一切准备就绪

translation.en: We're here at the diving center, packing everything.
translation.zh: 我们在潜水中心 收拾好东西

translation.en: Then we'll head to the sea. I'll show you the Blue Hole.
translation.zh: 然后就要下海了我会给大家看看蓝洞

translation.en: [Alessia] He seemed more excited than I was.
translation.zh: 他似乎比我更兴奋

translation.en: And I found that quite endearing.
translation.zh: 我觉得这一点特别很可爱

translation.en: [man, in English] That's prickish.
translation.zh: 有点蠢

translation.en: [Alessia, in Italian] But we were both a bit awkward.
translation.zh: 但我们俩都感觉有点尴尬

translation.en: [Lily, in English] It was the first time that we would see somebody cross the Arch,
translation.zh: 那是我们第一次将要亲眼目睹有人穿越拱门

translation.en: and being involved in the dive was super exciting.
translation.zh: 能参与潜水过程 这非常令人兴奋

translation.en: We're gonna go training together.
translation.zh: 我们将要一起训练了

translation.en: I was like, "Oh my God. I'm gonna train with Alessia. Dear Jesus!"
translation.zh: 我对自己说：“天啊我要和阿莱西娅一起训练了 天啊！”

translation.en: And she shows up with a ham sandwich and a can of Coke.
translation.zh: 然后她就出现了一手拿着火腿三明治 一手拿着可乐

translation.en: I was like, "Oh my God. Okay, I love her already."
translation.zh: 我说：“天啊 我已经爱上她了”

translation.en: Okay, Alessia. On your feet.
translation.zh: 好了 阿莱西娅 双脚着地

translation.en: [man] I knew she'd just set a world record.
translation.zh: 我知道她刚刚打破了世界纪录

translation.en: She matched the world record one day in training.
translation.zh: 她训练一天后就又追平了自己创下的记录

translation.en: It was inspiring
translation.zh: 看到有人能完成

translation.en: to see someone do these depths that I'd kinda only dreamed of doing.
translation.zh: 我做梦才敢想象的深度 鼓舞人心

translation.en: And you could tell, like…
translation.zh: 你能看得出来

translation.en: Like, even Steve, he'd be like, "Ah, she makes it look too easy."
translation.zh: 连史蒂夫都会说“她让这一切看起来如此轻松”

translation.en: You know? But it was… That was, like, that was her. [laughs]
translation.zh: 懂吗？但那就是…她就是这样

translation.en: [Lily] Alessia and Steve were together all the time.
translation.zh: 阿莱西娅和史蒂夫总是在一起

translation.en: He was coaching her and preparing her for the Arch,
translation.zh: 他在指导她 让她准备挑战拱门

translation.en: sitting down every evening after her training for weeks,
translation.zh: 连续几周 每天训练完晚上又和她坐下来讨论

translation.en: going through everything, telling her what she should do next.
translation.zh: 一样一样核对告诉她接下来要做什么

translation.en: It's another evening in Dahab free divers.
translation.zh: 在达哈卜自由潜水者的又一个夜晚

translation.en: [Lily] Then they were together every evening.
translation.zh: 然后 他们每个晚上都在一起度过

translation.en: [Stephen] Say hello.
translation.zh: 打个招呼吧

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Say hello, guys.
translation.zh: 打个招呼吧 各位

translation.en: [all] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Lily] It was an amazing summer.
translation.zh: 那是个很棒的夏天

translation.en: They had a very special connection.
translation.zh: 他们之间有很特别的联系

translation.en: It was just a really good match. [laughs]
translation.zh: 他们真的是天生一对

translation.en: Simon! Belated happy birthday, bud. Hope you had a great one.
translation.zh: 西蒙 迟到的生日祝福希望你度过了一个愉快的生日

translation.en: Sorry it's only me to say happy birthday.
translation.zh: 抱歉 只有我给你送上生日祝福

translation.en: Or actually, no, there's somebody else. Wait.
translation.zh: 或者说 其实不是还有另一个人 稍等

translation.en: Happy birthday!
translation.zh: 生日快乐！

translation.en: [Alessia, in Italian] He adored being in the desert.
translation.zh: 他喜欢在沙漠里生活

translation.en: The happiness we shared was amazing.
translation.zh: 我们分享的幸福特别美好

translation.en: [Lily, in English] We thought, "Okay, this could be something pretty special."
translation.zh: 我们觉得：“好的这可能会发展成非常特别的经历”

translation.en: We are gonna win the world championships.
translation.zh: 我们会拿下各个世界冠军头衔

translation.en: We are gonna make world records.
translation.zh: 我们要创造世界纪录

translation.en: And this amazing lady
translation.zh: 这位出色的女士

translation.en: is going to win the world championships.
translation.zh: 将赢得世界冠军

translation.en: True that.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [Homar, in Italian] We were all together that evening. It was our last night.
translation.zh: 那天晚上我们都在一起那是我们告别的夜晚

translation.en: And I remember he turned to Alessia and said,
translation.zh: 我记得他转向阿莱西娅 对她说

translation.en: "You'll be the first woman to do the Arch after Natalia Molchanova."
translation.zh: “你是纳塔利娅·莫尔查诺娃后第一位挑战拱门的女性”

translation.en: We told Stephen,
translation.zh: 我们告诉史蒂芬

translation.en: "Look after Alessia."
translation.zh: “照顾好阿莱西娅”

translation.en: And obviously, as a safety, he told me…
translation.zh: 显然 身为安全潜水员 他回答我说…

translation.en: "Leave it with me."
translation.zh: “交给我就行”

translation.en: [in Italian] We're discussing the dive before getting in the water.
translation.zh: 我们在做潜水之前的讨论

translation.en: This is my coach, Steve, and these are some other athletes.
translation.zh: 这是我的教练史蒂芬还有其他几位运动员

translation.en: We'll get in the water soon.
translation.zh: 我们很快就将下水

translation.en: I'm preparing all the gear.
translation.zh: 我在准备所有的装备

translation.en: We're ready to get in the water.
translation.zh: 我们已经做好下水准备了

translation.en: [Kristina, in English] Steve asked me to take photos of this dive.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬让我为这次潜水拍照

translation.en: I took pictures doing briefing for all safety divers.
translation.zh: 我拍了他给所有安全潜水员做讲解的照片

translation.en: Steve really went through each detail.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬梳理了每一个细节

translation.en: Everybody knew exactly what they were supposed to do.
translation.zh: 大家都清楚自己该做什么

translation.en: [Lily] The plan was Alessia would dive 52 meters, pulling herself on the rope,
translation.zh: 原本的计划是阿莱西娅攀着绳索下潜52米

translation.en: and then, entering the Arch, swim horizontally for 30 meters.
translation.zh: 然后进入拱门 平行游动30米

translation.en: As she arrived on the other side of the Arch,
translation.zh: 等她游到拱门的另一侧

translation.en: the safety line should be there in the middle.
translation.zh: 安全绳应该就在中间

translation.en: Steve would be there at the end of the line waiting for her.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬应该会在安全绳末端等着她

translation.en: Natalia crossed the Arch with a monofin.
translation.zh: 纳塔利娅是穿着单蹼穿越拱门的

translation.en: [Nathan] What Alessia prepared for was a dive without the monofin,
translation.zh: 阿莱西娅则准备不穿单蹼穿越

translation.en: which is the hardest way you can do it.
translation.zh: 这是最困难的方式

translation.en: [Lily] Maybe she wanted to do it that way to be better than the best free diver ever.
translation.zh: 也许她想要这么做证明自己比其他自由潜水员更优秀

translation.en: Everything was timed.
translation.zh: 每个动作都计了时

translation.en: They had made practice runs
translation.zh: 他们做过练习

translation.en: to know how long exactly it takes her to go down to 52 meters,
translation.zh: 知道她下潜52米需要多久

translation.en: how long it takes for her to swim horizontally for 30 meters.
translation.zh: 她平行游30米需要多久

translation.en: And we had a countdown,
translation.zh: 我们做了倒计时

translation.en: so we would make sure that Steve would be already there before she arrived.
translation.zh: 这样就能确保史蒂芬会在她抵达之前就到位

translation.en: [Kristina] I go down with the other two technical divers
translation.zh: 我和其他两名技术潜水员一起下潜

translation.en: with a camera to do the filming.
translation.zh: 带着摄像机进行拍摄

translation.en: [Nathan] After she goes down, my job was to hold the rope,
translation.zh: 她下潜后 我的工作是拉着绳索

translation.en: wait until we felt her hit the bottom,
translation.zh: 等我们感觉到她触底

translation.en: go down a few meters, look.
translation.zh: 往下游个几米

translation.en: If she wasn't coming back up, come up and we're done.
translation.zh: 看一下 如果她没有回头没有往水面上游 我们就没事了

translation.en: After she swam through the Arch,
translation.zh: 在游过拱门后

translation.en: she was relying on finding the rope on the other side to pull herself back up.
translation.zh: 她需要依靠另一侧的绳索将自己拉上水面

translation.en: [man] Five, four, three, two, one, zero.
translation.zh: 五、四、三、二、一、零

translation.en: [Nathan] We watched Alessia go down.
translation.zh: 我们看着阿莱西娅下潜

translation.en: I'm feeling the rope, so I can tell when she reaches the bottom.
translation.zh: 我拉着绳索 感觉她是否已经触底

translation.en: [Nathan] After we felt her let go of the rope, we'd give an okay sign
translation.zh: 在感觉到她放开绳索后我们就给出了OK的手势

translation.en: to tell the other safety divers that she entered the Arch.
translation.zh: 告诉其他安全潜水员她已经进入拱门

translation.en: That should've triggered Steve to go down.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬就应该在这个时候下潜

translation.en: [Lily] Ten seconds.
translation.zh: 十秒

translation.en: [Lily] I started to give the countdown to Steve.
translation.zh: 我开始给史蒂芬倒计时

translation.en: [Lily] Five, four, three.
translation.zh: 五、四、三

translation.en: He asked me for ten more seconds.
translation.zh: 他要求我再给他十秒钟

translation.en: I just didn't really understand why, because, um…
translation.zh: 我完全不明白为什么 截止目前

translation.en: so far, everything had been going according to plan.
translation.zh: 我完全不明白为什么 截止目前 一切都按计划进行

translation.en: So maybe the heart was going a bit too fast for his liking,
translation.zh: 一切都按计划进行 也许是因为他的心跳太快了 他不满意

translation.en: so he wanted to take a few more seconds to be really ready.
translation.zh: 所以想多花几秒做准备

translation.en: I really don't know, because you can't discuss with him,
translation.zh: 我真的不知道 因为你无法跟他讨论

translation.en: because he's preparing for his dive, so he's not gonna talk.
translation.zh: 他正在准备下潜 不能说话

translation.en: It took him a little bit extra to give me the signal.
translation.zh: 他多花了一点时间才给我信号

translation.en: [Kristina] Alessia is coming out of the Arch, but Steve is not there.
translation.zh: 阿莱西娅从拱门游出来 史蒂芬不在

translation.en: She doesn't see the rope.
translation.zh: 她看不到绳索

translation.en: She is swimming the wrong direction.
translation.zh: 她游错方向了

translation.en: She didn't realize that she was already out.
translation.zh: 她没意识到自己已经游出了拱门

translation.en: [Lily] I have, uh, one hand on the rope.
translation.zh: 我一只手拿着绳索

translation.en: I'm waiting for the feel of the pull to say that they're starting to come up.
translation.zh: 等着他们拉动绳子表示他们开始往上游了

translation.en: The pull is not coming.
translation.zh: 他们一直没有拉动绳子

translation.en: I start to worry.
translation.zh: 我开始担心了

translation.en: Maybe she was swimming a little bit slower.
translation.zh: 也许她游得慢了一点

translation.en: Let's wait a little bit longer.
translation.zh: 我们再等一会儿吧

translation.en: [Nathan] They should've been coming up
translation.zh: 他们应该要往上游了

translation.en: by the time we swam across to the other side.
translation.zh: 等我们游到另一边

translation.en: I knew at that point something was wrong.
translation.zh: 我当时就知道肯定出事了

translation.en: [Lily] Now it's too long.
translation.zh: 已经过去太久了

translation.en: Something is not right.
translation.zh: 不太对劲

translation.en: [Kristina] Alessia needs to go up immediately.
translation.zh: 阿莱西娅需要立刻出水

translation.en: She didn't know that she's in completely the wrong place.
translation.zh: 她不知道自己完全游错了地方

translation.en: In one moment, Steve left the rope super quickly.
translation.zh: 突然 史蒂芬以很快的速度离开了绳索

translation.en: As a scuba diver, I cannot do shit.
translation.zh: 身为水肺潜水员 我什么都做不了

translation.en: I was very far.
translation.zh: 我距离他们很远

translation.en: I was just screaming.
translation.zh: 我一直在尖叫

translation.en: [Lily] I could see all the way to the end of the line.
translation.zh: 我能看到绳子的末端

translation.en: There was no one.
translation.zh: 没有人

translation.en: [Nathan] We just can't see them.
translation.zh: 我们看不到他们

translation.en: Think fast. Maybe the water current took them.
translation.zh: 加快思考速度也许他们被水流带走了

translation.en: We would need to search a much bigger area.
translation.zh: 我们需要在更大的区域内搜寻

translation.en: Thirty meters away, there was loads and loads of tourists snorkeling.
translation.zh: 30米外 有很多游客在浮潜

translation.en: We're looking for someone amongst a mess of people that can't properly swim.
translation.zh: 我们要在一堆不太会游泳的人中间 寻找一个人

translation.en: [Lily] Everywhere I look, they're not there.
translation.zh: 我到处都找遍了 都找不到他们

translation.en: I decided to come up and see if I could see them on the surface.
translation.zh: 我决定浮出水面看看能不能在水面上看到他们

translation.en: [Lily] There was no explanation.
translation.zh: 没有任何解释

translation.en: [Kristina] I was swimming as fast as I could.
translation.zh: 我游得尽可能快了

translation.en: I need to see if they are alive.
translation.zh: 我需要看到 他们是否还活着

translation.en: [Alessia, in Italian] The first meters, everything seemed normal.
translation.zh: 刚开始几米 感觉一切都正常

translation.en: Until I reached the Arch.
translation.zh: 直到我游到拱门

translation.en: I remember while I was swimming, I felt it was a bit strenuous.
translation.zh: 我记得我在游的时候 感觉有点费力

translation.en: There was a problem.
translation.zh: 出了问题

translation.en: Steve wasn't there, but neither was the rope.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬不在 绳索也不在

translation.en: I just tried to follow the reef,
translation.zh: 我试图跟着珊瑚礁游

translation.en: trying to see where the rope was.
translation.zh: 试着找到绳索

translation.en: But I realized I couldn't find it.
translation.zh: 但我发现我根本找不到

translation.en: I'd made a mistake.
translation.zh: 我犯了错误

translation.en: I suddenly saw Steve in front of me.
translation.zh: 我突然看到史蒂芬在我面前

translation.en: I remember he took my hands.
translation.zh: 我记得他抓住我的手

translation.en: And he swam, bringing me to the surface.
translation.zh: 他游着把我带上了水面

translation.en: I don't remember the first seconds when I surfaced.
translation.zh: 我不记得我刚出水的那几秒了

translation.en: I only remember, after a while,
translation.zh: 我只记得 过了一会儿之后

translation.en: looking around and not understanding a thing.
translation.zh: 我四处张望 什么都不明白

translation.en: [Kristina, in English] Steve's face was in the water.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬的脸朝向下

translation.en: And I started screaming on her, like, "Turn him face up!"
translation.zh: 我开始朝她大喊：“让他脸朝天！”

translation.en: But I didn't realize that she had blacked out.
translation.zh: 但我没意识到她已经丧失意识了

translation.en: And when I started screaming, because I really screamed a lot,
translation.zh: 我开始拼命大喊 我喊了很多次

translation.en: she basically woke up, and she started acting immediately.
translation.zh: 她醒了过来 立刻开始行动

translation.en: [in Italian] Maybe I could have done more.
translation.zh: 我也许可以做更多的

translation.en: If I had been more conscious, I don't know.
translation.zh: 如果我更清醒的话 我也不知道

translation.en: [Nathan, in English] If you are on your own, and you start blacking out,
translation.zh: 如果你孤身一人开始失去意识

translation.en: you have to be on your back. If you're not on your back, you're done.
translation.zh: 必须要仰面朝上 否则就完了

translation.en: Steve probably took his last seconds of consciousness
translation.zh: 史蒂芬很可能用尽了自己最后几秒的意识

translation.en: to make sure she was in a position that she'd survive in
translation.zh: 确保她处在可以活下去的位置

translation.en: at the expense of ending up face down.
translation.zh: 不惜让自己脸朝下 丧失意识

translation.en: [in Italian] The worst thing is we couldn't do anything.
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是 我们什么都做不了

translation.en: We couldn't save him.
translation.zh: 我们救不了他

translation.en: He rescued me, but I couldn't rescue him.
translation.zh: 他救了我 但我救不了他

translation.en: He was a hero, and he showed it till the end.
translation.zh: 他是个英雄 直到最后一刻

translation.en: [Kristina, in English] You can see in the last photo, he lost his life to save hers.
translation.zh: 可以在最后一张照片上看到他为了救她而牺牲了自己

translation.en: I was diving the lighthouse.
translation.zh: 我在潜水通过灯塔

translation.en: Like, actually, over there.
translation.zh: 其实就在那边

translation.en: I finish my dive, I…
translation.zh: 当我完成潜水后 看了一下手机

translation.en: I look at my phone,
translation.zh: 看了一下手机

translation.en: even, like, with my suit on, like, I…
translation.zh: 甚至连潜水服都没脱 我看着手机说：“什么？”

translation.en: My phone, I look at my phone, like, "What?"
translation.zh: 我看着手机说：“什么？”

translation.en: Like, there are 50 missed calls.
translation.zh: 有50多个未接电话

translation.en: And I received a phone call.
translation.zh: 我接到了一个电话

translation.en: Something happened to Steve.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬出事了

translation.en: And…
translation.zh: 他…

translation.en: It… They couldn't bring him back.
translation.zh: 那个…他们没能把他救回来

translation.en: My first reaction was, "Shit. I wasn't there."
translation.zh: 我的第一反应是：“该死 我没在场”

translation.en: "I could've saved him if I would have been there."
translation.zh: “如果我当时在场…我可以救他”

translation.en: [Francesca] He was choosing her over himself.
translation.zh: 他为了救她而牺牲了自己

translation.en: I'm very clear that he knew that someone was gonna die that day,
translation.zh: 我很清楚地知道他早就知道当天有人会死

translation.en: and he wasn't gonna let it be her. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 他绝不容许她出事

translation.en: [in Italian] I would give my life.
translation.zh: 我愿意献上我自己的命

translation.en: Mine instead of his.
translation.zh: 用我的命换他的

translation.en: [in English] He wouldn't… he wouldn't have forgiven himself if he wouldn't have saved her, you know?
translation.zh: 如果他没去救她他是不会原谅自己的

translation.en: [Francesca] Everybody, we'll just dive until we feel
translation.zh: 各位 我们持续下潜

translation.en: we want to release our flowers
translation.zh: 直到我们感觉到想要放下手中的花

translation.en: and give thanks for such a wonderful human in our lives,
translation.zh: 感谢这个曾经陪伴过我们的美好的人

translation.en: sending all the good energy
translation.zh: 将史蒂芬给过我们的美好能量

translation.en: that Stephen gave to all of us.
translation.zh: 全部传递散出去

translation.en: [Peter] Everybody who loved Stephen did a big underwater vigil.
translation.zh: 每一个热爱史蒂芬的人都参加了一次大型的水下守夜活动

translation.en: They all held their breath for 39 seconds to represent each year of his life.
translation.zh: 他们共同屏住呼吸39秒每一秒代表他生命中的一年

translation.en: There was never ever a death
translation.zh: 没有任何人的死亡

translation.en: which moved the place the way that this… this one did.
translation.zh: 像他这样感动了所有人

translation.en: It was hundreds of people. I mean, everybody.
translation.zh: 有几百个人 所有人都来了

translation.en: How? How can one person touch so many?
translation.zh: 怎么会？一个人是怎么触碰到那么多人的心灵的？

translation.en: He must've been a pretty special person, right?
translation.zh: 他一定是个非常特别的人 对吧？

translation.en: Part of grief is kind of selfish.
translation.zh: 悲伤的一部分是自私

translation.en: And the selfish part of grief… makes me miss him. I miss him.
translation.zh: 而自私的这部分…让我思念着他 我想念他

translation.en: I miss him not coming home. I miss him in my life.
translation.zh: 我想念他不回家的日子 我想念他在我的生命里

translation.en: But I am much consoled by how he lived.
translation.zh: 但他生前的生活方式也给了我安慰

translation.en: He was pretty courageous.
translation.zh: 他很勇敢

translation.en: The Masai plains.
translation.zh: 马赛平原

translation.en: We're completely alone.
translation.zh: 这里没有任何其他人

translation.en: Jebel Toubkal.
translation.zh: 图卜卡勒峰

translation.en: Nice mountain in North Africa.
translation.zh: 位于北非的绝美山峰

translation.en: [Peter] Stephen was searching for something all of his life.
translation.zh: 史蒂芬一生都在寻找某样东西

translation.en: I did it! [laughs]
translation.zh: 我做到了

translation.en: [Peter] He had found something he loved
translation.zh: 他找到了他爱的东西

translation.en: and somebody who shared his dream.
translation.zh: 也找到了与他分享梦想的人

translation.en: Alessia and the sea. They were all he needed.
translation.zh: 阿莱西娅与大海 那就是他需要的一切

translation.en: [Alessia, in Italian] He will always be with me.
translation.zh: 他永远都会和我在一起

translation.en: I remember his eyes…
translation.zh: 我记得他的眼睛…

translation.en: and try to remember all the things he'd tell me.
translation.zh: 试着记住他告诉我的话

translation.en: To live, to be happy.
translation.zh: 好好活着 快乐下去

translation.en: To believe in myself.
translation.zh: 相信我自己

translation.en: [in English] Enjoy yourself to the max!
translation.zh: 尽全力享受人生！

translation.en: Okay? Kiss.
translation.zh: 好吗？亲一个

translation.en: [Alessia, in Italian] I try and remember his hugs.
translation.zh: 我试着记住他的拥抱

translation.en: He's the person who made me realize what it really means to hug someone.
translation.zh: 是他让我懂得了拥抱别人究竟意味着什么

translation.en: From the hug, you'd understand how deeply he cared about you
translation.zh: 从拥抱中 你能明白他有多关心你

translation.en: and all the feelings you could share together.
translation.zh: 以及你们能一起分享的所有感受

translation.en: He gave his life
translation.zh: 他为了阿莱西娅

translation.en: for Alessia.
translation.zh: 牺牲了自己

translation.en: A pain like this stays with you.
translation.zh: 这种伤痛是不会消散的

translation.en: You go on.
translation.zh: 你努力负重前行

translation.en: But that wound is there, and it won't heal.
translation.zh: 但那个伤口永远敞开着 无法愈合

translation.en: [Alessia] He will always be in my heart.
translation.zh: 他永远都在我心里

translation.en: He's going to be with me forever,
translation.zh: 他会永远和我在一起

translation.en: because I want him to stay with me for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 因为我这一辈子都想要他和我在一起
